update jk_loan_product set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, limit_scope_from = #{limitScopeFrom,jdbcType=INTEGER}, limit_scope_to = #{limitScopeTo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, interest_scope_from = #{interestScopeFrom,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, interest_scope_to = #{interestScopeTo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, interest_unit = #{interestUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, term_scope_from = #{termScopeFrom,jdbcType=INTEGER}, term_scope_to = #{termScopeTo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, term_unit = #{termUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, term_scope_from_day = #{termScopeFromDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, term_scope_to_day = #{termScopeToDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, repay_type = #{repayType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lending_time = #{lendingTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, introduce = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_condition = #{applyCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pilot_district_describe = #{pilotDistrictDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, required_information = #{requiredInformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, special_illustrate = #{specialIllustrate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remak = #{remak,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_propel = #{isPropel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_hot = #{isHot,jdbcType=TINYINT}, product_url = #{productUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_icon_url = #{productIconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, first_illustration_url = #{firstIllustrationUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, second_illustration_url = #{secondIllustrationUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_code = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certification_page_layout = #{certificationPageLayout,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_need_audit = #{isNeedAudit,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_open = #{isOpen,jdbcType=TINYINT}, use_type = #{useType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from jk_loan_product
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT
FROM jk_loan_product product WHERE product.`type`=0 and product.is_open=1
AND product.pilot_district_describe Like '%${city}%'
AND ((product.limit_scope_from>=${limitScopeFrom} and product.limit_scope_from<=${limitScopeTo}) OR (product.limit_scope_to>=${limitScopeFrom} and product.limit_scope_to<=${limitScopeTo}))
AND ((product.term_scope_from_day>=${termFromDay} and product.term_scope_from_day<=${termToDay}) OR (product.term_scope_to_day>=${termFromDay} and product.term_scope_to_day<=${termToDay}))
ORDER BY product.interest_scope_from
ORDER BY product.interest_scope_to DESC
ORDER BY product.create_time DESC

SELECT d.product_code as productCode from jk_order a LEFT JOIN jk_order_item b on a.id=order_id LEFT JOIN jk_goods c on b.goods_id=c.id LEFT JOIN jk_loan_product d on c.product_id=d.id where a.id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
